ensemblQueryR 0.1.0
  • Reference

    Function to query Ensembl LD data with a single rsID

    ensemblQueryLDwithSNP.Rd

    Function to query Ensembl LD data with a single rsID

    ensemblQueryLDwithSNP(
  rsid,
  r2 = 0.8,
  d.prime = 0.8,
  window.size = 500,
  pop = "1000GENOMES:phase_3:EUR"
)

    Arguments

    pop

    Value

    data.frame with 5 columns: `query` (original query SNP), `snp_in_ld` (all SNPs in LD within parameters specified), `r2` (the r-squared value for query-snp_in_ld), `d_prime` (the D' value for query-snp_in_ld), `population_name` (the population LD was calculated from)

    Examples

    ensemblQueryLDwithSNP(rsid="rs3851179", r2=0.8, d.prime=0.8, window.size=500, pop="1000GENOMES:phase_3:EUR")
